name: Shouki Tsuda
description: I'm a developer and researcher working in the blockchain industry since 2018. I have worked on the development of protocol layers in several projects. Mainly based in Japan, in recent years I have been researching a wide range of cryptographic theory applications, including zero-knowledge proofs, MPC and FHE.I'm also active in community building and have led Bitpickers, a developer community, for the past few years. Recently organised the Progcrypto Camp, a cryptography camp in Japan.
